page.title: 10THE BARWELL ESTATE (3)
page.content:
{THE HUNTER TRIAL { This October event is part of the national championship of the British Airways Hunter Trial . It is the final after about 20 previous trials held all over Britain. Perhaps 250 horses will attempt the difficult course. Top riders like Richard Mead & Lucinda Green compete in the invitation event. { {TELEVISION { Thames TV frequently use{Barwell}for filming. Many adverts and programmes have been 'shot' there, including 'Sooty'.
{INFORMATION supplied by Mr. T. Barker, {proprietor of the estate & compiled by {A.Bridger,R.Cook & J.Sharpe
